title: Breaking Through the Clouds - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Comedy   Drama   Mystery   Romance   Yaoi
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Betrayal   Clever Protagonist   Couple Growth   Crime   Cruel Characters   Depictions of Cruelty   Detectives   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Drugs   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Investigations   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Manly Gay Couple   Modern Day   Murders   Near-Death Experience   Organized Crime   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Police   Power Couple   Sickly Characters   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Wealthy Characters   Younger Love Interests
author: Huai Shang   淮上
description:
Foreboding clouds raced across the skies above the city.

Three years ago, as a consequence of Commander-in-Chief Jiang Ting’s error in judgement during an anti-drug operation in Gongzhou, a chain of explosions occurred at the scene and caused the Narcotics Division to suffer heavy casualties. Now three years later, Jiang Ting, whose flesh and bones should’ve faded from existence after dying at the line of duty, actually miraculously woke up from a vegetative state.

His heroic soul could not rest – he must return to the mortal world from the depths of hell and exert all that he has in order to bring the bloody and inconceivable truth to light.>
